name: Metal Madness
description:
A very basic game that turned out different from how i imagined i originally wanted it to be a parkour game where the user could only jump on metal but i accidentally gave the little box 'super powers' when touching metal and white draws power and doesn't let you jump i hope you will enjoy it.

Aim:

Reach the red block in the lowest amount of time possible 

Controls

Up arrow - Jump/climb/hug the metal

Left/right arrows - left / right 

Down arrow - Reset the game if you get stuck

ToNote

There is a little 'feature' where if you touch white and metal at the same time you cant jump after trynna jump I recommend you just go back and then go forward again it should fix the not being able to jump issue
